role_description: An Ansible role that installs Zsh and Oh My Zsh! on Linux/macOS systems
role_description_full_overview: [Oh My Zsh](https://ohmyz.sh/) is a delightful, open source, community-driven framework for managing your Zsh configurations. It comes bundled with thousands of helpful functions, helpers, plugins, themes, and a few things that make you shout oh my zsh!
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Zsh and Oh My Zsh! on Linux/macOS systems.
